channel.title: AjayK on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in AjayK on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Welcome to My Digital Home
item.description:
Hello and welcome!
I’m thrilled to have you here at my little corner of the internet.

This site was built using Hugo, a fast and flexible static site generator that lets me focus on what truly matters—creating and sharing content—without getting caught in the clutter of complex frameworks.

🌟 What You’ll Find Here

Depending on when you visit, you might find:

  • 🛠️ Projects – Code, builds, experiments, and things I’m working on
  • 📚 Blog – Articles, thoughts, how-tos, and observations
  • ✍️ Notes – Quick tips, references, or drafts in progress

Why This Site?

I wanted a space that feels personal yet professional—a kind of digital workshop. Hugo gives me the freedom to build something fast, responsive, and minimal. If you’re a fellow developer, student, or curious explorer, I hope you find value in what I share.
